actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to modify and extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain seals designed for use in aircraft.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the article description for seals of polyester fabric bonded over a silicone core for aircraft to suspend temporarily the duty on seals, made of silicone, or rubber, and either covered with, and/or containing, an embedded textile material for aircraft.

titles.title: A bill to modify and extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain seals designed for use in aircraft.
